choose.when:
select * from (select aa.*,rownum rnum from (select qid,qcate,qpw,qtitle,qrdate,mid,qlev,qcontent from userqna where qstep=0 order by qid desc)aa
order by rnum asc) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
choose.otherwise:
select * from (select aa.*,rownum rnum from (select qid,qcate,qpw,qtitle,qrdate,mid,qlev,qcontent from userqna where qstep=0 and qcate=#{qcate} order by qid desc)aa
order by rnum asc) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}

choose.when: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from userqna where qstep=0
choose.otherwise: select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from userqna where qstep=0 and qcate=#{qcate}

mapper.select: select qcontent from userqna where qstep = 1 and qref=#{qref}

select * from ( select * from userqna where qid>${qid} and qstep=0 order by qid asc )where rownum=1
